title: Sunrise Yoga in Central Park
description: Join us for a rejuvenating yoga session under the morning sun.

title: Brooklyn Pottery Workshop
description: A hands-on class where you'll make your own ceramic masterpiece.

title: Dallas Cooking Class: Southern Comfort Food
description: Learn to make classics like fried chicken and mac & cheese from a local chef.

title: Klyde Warren Park Bootcamp
description: An intense 45-minute outdoor workout session in the heart of Dallas.

title: NYC Meditation & Sound Bath
description: Relax and recharge with guided meditation and immersive sound therapy.

title: Dallas Painting & Wine Night
description: Sip wine while a local artist teaches you how to paint your masterpiece.

title: Chelsea Gallery Crawl
description: Explore rotating exhibitions at renowned Chelsea art galleries with a curator guide.

title: Trinity River Kayaking Tour
description: Enjoy scenic views and wildlife on this beginner-friendly kayak tour.

title: Broadway Dance Class
description: Channel your inner performer in a high-energy dance class led by Broadway pros.

title: Dallas Candle-Making Lab
description: Craft your own scented candles with personalized labels and packaging.
